record
n.
[
re'kord
] Anything written down and preserved.
v.
[
reko'rd
] To write down for future use.

home
[
ho:um
]
n.
sounds_of_words.ogg
1) One's own dwelling place; the house in which one livs.2) One's native land; the place or country in which one dwells. 3) The abiding place of the affections.
For without hearts there is no home.
4)
дом
at home - make yourself at home -
